properties.entry: Všetci pripojení používatelia prijímajú správu s novým hlasovaním
The email containing a special link has been sent to the email address, registered to the user corresponding to the data entered
Kliknite na miestnosť pre informácie o miestnosti
V tejto miestnosti nie je moderátor, ale sú tu participujúci. Musíte požiadať o moderáciu alebo počkať.
Kliknite sem pre vstup do miestnosti:
Ak máte problém s odkazom, skopírujte ho do vášho prehliadača:
Kliknite na tento link pre zadanie nového hesla
Kliknite sem pre zadanie nového hesla

Create users, rooms, organisations
and change configuration
Nahrať a importovať dialóg. Prosím vyberte súbor.
Naozaj chcete vyhodiť tohto klienta z miestnosti?
Vaše stretnutie bolo zavreté administrátorom alebo moderátorom.
Prosím počkajte na vstup moderátora do miestnosti
Pre dokončenie registrácie kliknite na nasledujúci odkaz
Musíte počkať pokiaľ moderátor vstúpi do miestnosti
Otestovať audio alebo video nastavenie pred vstupom do miestnosti môžte nahratím stretnutia na pár sekúnd. Môžte si potom prehrať nahrávku a skontrolovať svoje audio/video.
Môžte prejsť bez testovania ak neplánujete zverejniť svoje audio/video.
Verejné miestnosti sú prístupné pre všetkých používateľov
Súkromné miestnosti sú prístupné len pr používateľov určitej spoločnosti.

Rooms in this section are created for personal usage. There are some standard rooms plus the ones that are created through the calendar and have a start and an end date. The rooms created via the calendar are only listed in this section as long as they are valid.
If the room is moderated, any users with a moderator or administrator level access are automatically set to moderator when they enter the room
If you add an organisation to the room only users of that organisation have access to it
Nahrávka nie je ešte hotová na prezeranie
The Conference Number and PIN is automatically created via the OpenXG RPC-Gateway
Zmazať všetky objekty na tomto slide iba!
Turn this Flag on and the users will have only the Audio-Option and no Video in a conference room. This can by good to save bandwidth.
The webinar is already closed, you will be redirected to some interesting offerings in
If the room is closed users will be redirected to the exit URL.
The config files are in the folder OM_DATA_FOLDER/conf. You need to manually upload the files to this folder. Changes to the config file are immediately online.

If you enable "Add Domain to username" the value of the field "domain" is added to each login that the user enters in the login box. This is useful if the Login in the Ldap is stored including the domain name. Example: User enters "hans" domain is specified as "localhost.com", login that is verified against Ldap is: hans@localhost.com
Choose a conference room. The invited user will get a message with your name and a link to the room.

Add an optional request for meeting to the message and create a conference room. The Event is then copied in the calendar of every participant.
Add folders and organize your messages!

The user shares their personal contact data only to contacts.
Click here to visit your profile to see the full message ...
Do you really want to remove this whiteboard? This action cannot be undone.
Do not forget start recording! One user per room always needs to start it to have the recording afterwards.

Are you sure you want to close this Poll? No one will be able to vote
Are you sure you want to delete this Poll? The results will be deleted as well.
Changing the resolution affects bandwidth, bigger picture needs more bandwith!

Password protected are the links to the conference that are send to the participents when you save the calendar event, not the room! That means if you save the event multiple times but with different passwords every participent receives a new link that has a different password. But old links still work once send!

requests permission to draw on the whiteboard
Include uploaded files and recordings in backup

To save time and internet traffic you can use command line admin to backup/restore/upgrade:
  1. go to OM install dir (for ex. /opt/om)
  2. stop OM (for ex. ./bin/shutdown.sh)
  3. ./admin.sh -b -file ~/today_om_backup.zip (create backup of current OM)
  4. download archive with new OM
  5. mv /opt/om /opt/om.bak (move working version of OM just in case :))
  6. extract downloaded OM to the /opt/om
  7. ./admin.sh -i -file ~/today_om_backup.zip (or './admin.sh -i -file ~/today_om_backup.zip --db-type mysql --db-user om_user --db-pass om_user_pass' in case of you are using non-default DB )
  8. start OM

The backup includes are user generated data and configuration.
To update your system,
  1. ** Do DB backup, OM folder backup
  2. export your old system
  3. drop database
  4. re-install the new package into a new database
  5. and import the backup file again
  6. The backup should be imported before your users will have access to the system
Do you really want to purge this item? This can't be undone!

'Weak' password: at least 1 upper-case letter is required

Recommendation for production environment

DPI that ImageMagic will use for PDF to image conversion (default is 150)
Enter the dpi that ImageMagic will use for PDF to image conversion
Enter the quality of embedded jpeg pictures to quality. 0 is worst (small), 100 is best (big). (default:90)
Enter the quality of embedded jpeg pictures to quality. 0 is worst (small), 100 is best (big). (default:90)
Enter the path to FFMPEG, leave blank if FFMPEG is installed to system-path

Install ImageMagick on the server, you can get more information on http://www.imagemagick.org regarding installation. The instructions for installation can be found here http://www.imagemagick.org/script/binary-releases.php, however on most linux systems you can get it via the system's package manager (apt-get, dnf, yum etc)
Enter the path to ImageMagick, leave blank if ImageMagick is successfully installed to system-path
The path to OpenOffice/LibreOffice (optional) please set this to the real path in case jodconverter is unable to find OpenOffice/LibreOffice installation
The path to OpenOffice/LibreOffice (optional) please set this to the real path in case jodconverter is unable to find OpenOffice/LibreOffice installation automatically
Install SoX http://sox.sourceforge.net/ You should install SoX in a up to date copy! SoX 12.xx will NOT work!
Enter the path to SoX, leave blank if SoX is successfully installed to system-path

You can use this default crypt type which is equal to RFC 7914 - The scrypt Password-Based Key Derivation Function:org.apache.openmeetings.util.crypt.SCryptImplementation for more information or to write your own Crypt-Style see: Custom Crypt Mechanism You can edit this value later BUT previous created Users and Sessions might be not usable anymore
Enter the Class name of the Encryption Class. DO NOT ALTER THIS IF YOU ARE NOT SURE
Prefix for phone number of conference rooms

1. Enabling import of PDFs into whiteboard

    • Install GhostScript on the server, you can get more information on http://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~ghost/ regarding installation. The instructions for installation can be found there, however on most linux systems you can get it via your favorite package managers (apt-get it).

"democratic" by default, every user can directly enable audio/video without need for asking
only 2 users can have audio/video enabled (more users can be in the room and you can switch the audio/video between them of course)
"restricted" by default: Every regular user will need to ask if he wants to share audio/video
